name: Roo.grid.RowSelectionModel
desc:
The default SelectionModel used by {@link Roo.grid.Grid}.
It supports multiple selections and keyboard selection/navigation.

config.name: listeners
singleSelect
config.desc: True to allow selection of only one row at a time (defaults to false)

methods.name: selectRange
methods.desc: Selects a range of rows. All rows in between startRow and endRow are also selected.

params.name: startRow
params.desc: The index of the first row in the range

params.name: endRow
params.desc: The index of the last row in the range

params.name: keepExisting
params.desc: (optional) True to retain existing selections

methods.name: selectFirstRow
methods.desc: Selects the first row in the grid.

methods.name: deselectRow
methods.desc: Deselects a row.

params.name: row
params.desc: The index of the row to deselect

methods.name: getCount

params.name: record

methods.name: selectLastRow

params.name: keepExisting
params.desc: (optional) True to keep existing selections

methods.desc: Returns True if there is a selection.
